Articles.Content:
Whilst perusing some old screenshots, I believe I captured an image of you cruising into town back in 0.90.

Formerly incorrectly identified as the "Bumblebee" it shall now be known as the "Turkeymobile".

There you are masquerading as Jebediah. We know it can't actually be Jeb because he looks terrified.

Edited December 11, 2015 by Randazzo
